title: Caramelised scallops, shrimps and grits with pork jowl bacon
description: It's worth seeking out the American ingredients for this special occasion meal for two.
ingredients: 2 leaves of Chinese cabbage cut into medium size squares
4 small pieces of cooked crispy pork jowl or streaky bacon
2 breakfast radish, sliced thinly lengthwise and kept in ice cold water
fresh or dried oregano, borage flowers and forage herbs
